Text: ENRON ISC OPEN HOUSESpecial invitation to the ISC Educational Services Open House openhouse
UPDATEJeff My computer was not working yesterday afternoon and I was wondering if you have taken the check to the Security desk I lost alot of my documents and wasnt sure if you had responded Donnis

REJeff Sorry I havent answered sooner but I have been in a workshop for several days I had a buyer for the land and he is not able to get the land until late Dec or early Jan I am trying very hard to sell the land so that I can repay you I have someone else looking as well I will keep you posted and I know you need your money asap Thanks again for your help Donnis Original Message From Shankman Jeffrey A Sent Monday November AM To Traylor Donnis Subject Hi Donnis I hope your weekend was nice Last week I sent you an email on your timing for repayment Your last email to me states that this would be done so in November and I wanted to get an update from you I would appreciate a response Jeff

REJeff Good Morning I have good news I have the land sold but will not get the money until the last week of December If the deal closes sooner I will get the money to you asap I just want you to know that I appreciate everything that you have done for me and especially the opportunities you have given Jennifer Donnis Original Message From Shankman Jeffrey A Sent Wed AM To Traylor Donnis Cc Subject RE Donnis At per month ith will take you months to repay me which I am not willing to do I need assurance that you will repay me I dont understand what you mean when you say you need a little more time to have this resolvedplease clarify Thanks for your reply this morning Jeff Original Message From Traylor Donnis Sent Wednesday November AM To Shankman Jeffrey A Subject RE Jeff I would like to come up with a payment schedule I can pay month If you can just give me a little more time I will have this resolved Donnis Original Message From Shankman Jeffrey A Sent Tue PM To Traylor Donnis Cc Subject Hi Donnis I know it has been hard selling the land but we need to come up with a payment schedule or your will need to give me the land valued at What do you prefer In light of the difficult times at the company these days Id like to get this resolved Thanks for understanding Jeff

REJeff I would like to come up with a payment schedule I can pay month If you can just give me a little more time I will have this resolved Donnis Original Message From Shankman Jeffrey A Sent Tue PM To Traylor Donnis Cc Subject Hi Donnis I know it has been hard selling the land but we need to come up with a payment schedule or your will need to give me the land valued at What do you prefer In light of the difficult times at the company these days Id like to get this resolved Thanks for understanding Jeff

RE HelloThank you very much Jeff I will have all the money in November for you Can you leave the check at the security desk downstairs at the Enron Bldg Donnis Original Message From Shankman Jeffrey A Sent Mon AM To Traylor Donnis Cc Subject RE Hello Donnis I will loan you the other Will you also pay back the other Ive already loaned you by the first of November This will be the last loan I will make to you Again Im glad to help but Im doing this for Jennifer as well How would you like it delivered to you Jeff Original Message From Traylor Donnis Sent Monday August AM To Shankman Jeffrey A Subject Hello Sensitivity Private Jeff If you could loan me the I can have that paid back to you by the first of November I have someone who wants the acres but will not close on his house until the end of October I hope you will consider This would be the first time for me to ever own a home I dont have any other way of making this happen I want let you down This is a once in a lifetime deal for me I have so much to gain by this If I ever had to sell the house it is worth Thanks Donnis

RE HelloFirst I want to say Thank You Very Much Can you leave the check downstairs at the security desk I will have all of the money in November Thanks for everything Donnis Original Message From Shankman Jeffrey A Sent Mon AM To Traylor Donnis Cc Subject RE Hello Donnis I will loan you the other Will you also pay back the other Ive already loaned you by the first of November This will be the last loan I will make to you Again Im glad to help but Im doing this for Jennifer as well How would you like it delivered to you Jeff Original Message From Traylor Donnis Sent Monday August AM To Shankman Jeffrey A Subject Hello Sensitivity Private Jeff If you could loan me the I can have that paid back to you by the first of November I have someone who wants the acres but will not close on his house until the end of October I hope you will consider This would be the first time for me to ever own a home I dont have any other way of making this happen I want let you down This is a once in a lifetime deal for me I have so much to gain by this If I ever had to sell the house it is worth Thanks Donnis
Out of Office AutoReplyI will be out of the office on Friday Oct th and Monday Oct th
